<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="New Deduction default">77170ba64779ed10265ad698436d431f</macroponent><name>select_1/items</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    console.log(">>>",api.data.get_deduction_types.results);

    return [{
        "id": "usr1",
        "label": "User 1",
        "sublabel": "user1@servicenow.com",
        "avatarProps": {
            "userName": "User 1",
            "imageSrc": "http://i.pravatar.cc/24?u=33",
            "presence": "away"
        }
    }, {
        "id": "usr2",
        "label": "User 2",
        "sublabel": "user2@servicenow.com",
        "avatarProps": {
            "userName": "User 2",
            "imageSrc": "http://i.pravatar.cc/24?u=34",
            "presence": "busy"
        },
        "disabled": true
    }];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bryan.rodriguez@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-29 01:45:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>82aa0072477ded10265ad698436d43be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_1/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Voluntary Deductions" source="x_ebh_voluntary_0">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Voluntary Deductions">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_82aa0072477ded10265ad698436d43be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bryan.rodriguez@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-29 01:45:06</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
